name: HSP_QI_PEDIATRIC_QUALITY
description: Pediatric quality indicators for the hospital account. This table is related to ZC_QI_PEDIATRIC_QUALITY.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QI_PEDIATRIC_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: The pediatric quality indicator category ID for the hospital account.
entries: Retained Surgical Item or Unretrieved Device Fragment Count
RACHS-1 Pediatric Heart Surgery Mortality Rate
Central Venous Catheter-Related Blood Stream Infection Rate
